programme.title: Katavi - Africa's Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi National Park spans over 3,000 square miles of western Tanzania. Lions, hippos and crocodiles live in harmony, until an unusual climatic cycle turns the normal dry season into an extreme drought. Lion cubs face mortal danger from a rogue male lion intent on a takeover, hippos fight viciously for dwindling river territory, and even the crocodiles struggle to survive until the rains arrive.

programme.title: Katavi - Africa's Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs. Cheetah
programme.desc: Big Cat Wars will showcase an incredibly unique stock footage sequence of a moment when a predator on predator conflict turns deadly. The clip of lion vs cheetah is a nail biting moment that will shock, but in the end will shed new light on the mysterious relationship between these extraordinary big cats and their life-and-death struggle for survival.

programme.title: Jaguar Beach
programme.desc: On a remote stretch of Central America‚Äôs Pacific coast, the lush, volcanic landscape gives way to a startlingly different world: a dry tropical forest. Here, two creatures ‚Äî the sea turtle and the jaguar ‚Äî meet with spectacular consequences for both their species and the very different environments they inhabit, and an unwitting alliance turns the predator into the protector.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Owls can 'see' with their ears?and may be able to hear if a mouse is pregnant..and the rhinoceros has skin that sweats blood..

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Frogs may just be the key to human immortality while the cat's purrs may help keep astronauts alive in space..

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory. .

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols have reached the most dangerous stage of disassembling the 100-year-old barn: taking down the beams. Then, if all goes well, theyll transport the beams back to the farm. Each part of this process must be carefully orchestrated to protect these irreplaceable beams. Meanwhile, Beth tries training Clovis after he runs away from the farm. .

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the savannah turns into a battleground, it‚Äôs hard to choose a hero. We‚Äôre on the edge of our safari seats as a leopard is cornered by a pride of lions, a young impala is hurled into the air by a hippo and two hyenas try to drown each other. Then, the rarest of sightings as an Aardvark runs for its life from a brown hyaena. Who will win when it‚Äôs tooth versus claw?.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Milo is a young cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, which rules a territory on the west bank of the Luangwa River. 20-strong it's ruled by the notorious Punks, a coalition of three strong brothers, it's the largest pride for miles around, giving Milo the best start in life. But, in lion society, cubs are the glue that binds a pride.

programme.title: Zombie Animals
programme.desc: Some creatures stop at nothing when it comes to using other animals to get ahead. From Zombie moose, to parasites that take over the eyestalks of snails and mind-controlled rats chasing cats, naturalist Dan ONeil explores the weird world of alien invaders.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: The Misfit is a charismatic cub who's had a rough ride. A timid oddball once bullied by his big brothers and rejected by his mother, this plucky young lion is now a teenager.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Zambia's extraordinary Luangwa Valley is the perfect hunting ground for some of Africa's most iconic predators. Prides of lions, packs of wild dogs, clans of hyenas and solitary leopards vie for the upper hand in a land where the dry season brings prey to their doorsteps.

programme.title: Zombie Animals
programme.desc: Some creatures stop at nothing when it comes to using other animals to get ahead. From Zombie moose, to parasites that take over the eyestalks of snails and mind-controlled rats chasing cats, naturalist Dan ONeil explores the weird world of alien invaders.

programme.title: Zombie Animals
programme.desc: When it comes to survival, sometimes taking over another animal is the only way to get a step ahead. Naturalist Dan ONeil investigates the weird and wonderful world of mutant animals, mind controlling fungus, and a fish that transforms itself into a set of testes. .

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Beloved clinic house cat, Tater, falls ill and the team bands together to save him. Charles debuts a new look, Dr. Pol treats a wood-chewing steer, and Dr. Brenda looks after a lab with stomach issues. A nosey Chihuahua eats a poisonous snack, so Dr. Lisa dispenses a messy antidote and Dr. Nicole jumps in to rescue a mama goat in labor.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The vets respond to multiple emergencies; a horse seriously traumatized in an accident to a sweet little dog left with a very bad injury to its eye after a fight. Dr. Pol treats a racehorse with a career-threatening hoof injury, while Drs. Nicole and Brenda bring the clinic on the road. A feisty bull reindeer has a badly lacerated antler and there‚Äôs even a guinea fowl needing Dr. Pol‚Äôs help.
